# <code>url host</code> for network

<div class='command-title'>Get the host of a URL</div>

## Signature

```> url host ...(rest)```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Parameters

 * ```...rest <CellPath>```: optionally operate by cell path
## Examples

  Get host of a url
```shell
  > echo 'http://www.example.com/foo/bar' | url host
```
